headline: Why Booking Holdings Inc. (BKNG) is One of the Best Cheap Blue Chip Stocks to Buy According to Analysts
summary: Booking Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:BKNG) is one of the best cheap blue chip stocks to buy according to analysts. JPMorgan maintained a Buy rating on Booking Holdings Inc. headline: A Look At Booking Holdings (BKNG) Valuation After Q4 Earnings Beat And Analyst Upgrade
summary: Booking Holdings (BKNG) is back in focus after its Q4 earnings beat, with revenue of US$6,349 million and net income of US$1,428 million, alongside an analyst upgrade that has sharpened investor attention. See our latest analysis for Booking Holdings. The post earnings reaction has been choppy, with the share price down 16.63% over the past 30 days and a year to date share price return decline of 20.36%. However, the 3 year total shareholder return of 64.43% and 5 year total shareholder...

headline: Online travel agencies may emerge as AI winners, Morgan Stanley says
summary: Investing.com – Online travel agencies (OTAs) may be better positioned to benefit from artificial intelligence than widely feared, challenging the consensus view that AI agents will disintermediate traditional booking platforms, according to a Morgan Stanley note.

headline: Jim Cramer Notes “I Like Marriott for Travel”
summary: Marriott International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MAR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer Recently Discussed. Cramer highlighted the stock while showing a positive sentiment toward the travel industry, as he remarked: I like Booking Holdings. I like Marriott for travel. I think the travel bull market lives.
